hero.title: Enterprise AI Software Built on

hero.demoMessage: Hey Scott, I've analyzed your business data and can save you $50,000 annually in operational costs!

buildAgent.title: Build Your First AI Agent for Your Business
buildAgent.subtitle: Automate decisions, reduce operational friction, and unlock scalable growth with AI-powered agents.
buildAgent.whatIsDesc: An AI Agent is an autonomous system that makes decisions, takes actions, and solves problems using artificial intelligence. Unlike simple chatbots, AI Agents understand context, access real-time data, use tools, and make intelligent decisions to automate complex workflows.
buildAgent.feature1Desc: Agents analyze data, make decisions, and take actions without human intervention for routine tasks.
buildAgent.feature2Desc: Agents connect to APIs, databases, CRMs, and business tools to perform real work.
buildAgent.feature3Desc: Agents learn from feedback and improve performance over time.

steps.title: Step-by-Step: How an AI Agent Is Built
steps.subtitle: Follow our proven 10-step process to build your first AI Agent. Each step builds on the previous one to create a production-ready AI Agent.
steps.step1Desc: What problem will the agent solve? Who is the end-user? What kind of inputs and outputs are needed?
steps.step1Item1: Identify the business problem to solve
steps.step2Desc: Choose data formats (text, voice, API, etc.). Connect to databases, CRMs, or external APIs. Define how real-time the data should be.
steps.step3Desc: Clean and normalize the input data. Tokenize text or extract structured data. Format the data for your chosen model.
steps.step4Desc: Pick from LLMs (e.g., GPT-4, Claude, Gemini). Decide between hosted APIs or custom models. Ensure the model supports your task: chat, reasoning, retrieval, etc.
steps.step4Item1: Select LLM (OpenAI v5.2, Claude, AWS Bedrock)
steps.step5Desc: Decide the control flow (decision trees, planner, or tool use). Use frameworks like LangChain, CrewAI, AutoGen. Define how tools, memory, and prompts are connected.
steps.step6Desc: Create structured prompts using templates. Integrate tools like search, APIs, or calculators. Test for accurate and useful outputs.
steps.step7Desc: Simulate different user inputs. Evaluate agent response accuracy. Identify edge cases and unexpected outputs.
steps.step8Desc: Host on cloud (e.g., AWS, Vercel, Streamlit). Provide a frontend (chat UI, voice interface, etc.). Add logging for user interactions.
steps.step9Desc: Track user queries and agent responses. Monitor accuracy, latency, and failure points. Improve prompts, retrain if needed.
steps.step10Desc: Fine-tune model with feedback data. Keep tools and APIs updated. Let the agent evolve with use cases.

businessResults.title: What This Means for Your Business
businessResults.subtitle: Businesses using AI agents reduce operational costs, automate repetitive decision-making, and unlock new revenue streams by scaling expertise without scaling headcount.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Build Your First AI Agent?
ctaSection.subtitle: Let's turn your business process into an intelligent, automated system that scales with your growth.

aiSoftware.title: Enterprise AI Software Solutions
aiSoftware.subtitle: We develop production-grade AI Software powered by OpenAI v5.2, Claude, AWS Bedrock, LlamaIndex, and MCP Servers. Our AI software integrates seamlessly into your enterprise workflows, delivering intelligent automation with enterprise-grade reliability.
aiSoftware.card1Desc: Our AI software is built on a modern, scalable architecture leveraging multiple AI models and frameworks. We combine OpenAI v5.2 (GPT-4), Anthropic's Claude (Opus & Sonnet), AWS Bedrock, and LlamaIndex to create robust, production-ready AI software solutions.

aiSoftware.card1Item2: LlamaIndex RAG framework for intelligent document processing
aiSoftware.card1Item3: MCP Servers for seamless system integrations
aiSoftware.card1Item4: Perplexity AI for real-time information retrieval
aiSoftware.card2Desc: Our AI software solutions are built for enterprise scale, with security, compliance, and reliability at the core. We leverage AWS infrastructure, Anthropic's enterprise models, and OpenAI v5.2's latest capabilities to deliver AI software that meets the highest standards.
aiSoftware.card2Item3: Scalable AI software architecture on AWS
aiSoftware.card2Item4: 24/7 monitoring and support for AI software

useCases.title: AI Solutions for Every Business Challenge
useCases.subtitle: From sales automation to customer support, our AI software transforms manual operations across industries. Each solution is custom-built for your specific workflow.
useCases.card1Desc: Automatically score and qualify inbound leads based on company size, budget signals, intent data, and fit criteria. Routes hot leads instantly to sales reps.
useCases.card2Desc: Crafts personalized sales emails by researching prospects, analyzing LinkedIn profiles, and tailoring messaging to their specific pain points and company context.
useCases.card2Tech: Claude Sonnet ‚Ä¢ Perplexity AI ‚Ä¢ MCP Servers
useCases.card3Desc: Handles tier-1 support tickets automatically. Answers FAQs, troubleshoots common issues, processes refunds, and escalates complex cases with full context to human agents.
useCases.card4Desc: Extracts, classifies, and routes information from contracts, invoices, and forms. Automates data entry and validation with 99%+ accuracy.
useCases.card5Desc: Automates accounts payable by extracting invoice data, matching to POs, flagging discrepancies, and routing for approval. Reduces processing time by 85%.
useCases.card5Tech: Claude Sonnet ‚Ä¢ AWS Bedrock ‚Ä¢ MCP Servers
useCases.card6Desc: Reviews contracts for risk clauses, compliance issues, and negotiation opportunities. Summarizes key terms and flags deviations from standard templates.
useCases.card7Desc: Screens resumes, matches candidates to job requirements, schedules interviews, and provides hiring recommendations based on skills and culture fit.
useCases.card7Tech: OpenAI v5.2 ‚Ä¢ AWS Bedrock ‚Ä¢ MCP Servers
useCases.card8Desc: Guides new hires through onboarding, answers policy questions, schedules training, and ensures compliance documentation is completed.
useCases.card9Desc: Joins meetings, takes notes, identifies action items, and sends follow-up summaries. Integrates with calendar and project management tools.
useCases.card9Tech: OpenAI v5.2 ‚Ä¢ Perplexity AI ‚Ä¢ MCP Servers
useCases.ctaSubtitle: We build custom AI solutions for any business process. Let's discuss your specific needs.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: Our proven process takes you from discovery to deployment in 8-12 weeks, then ongoing maintenance and iteration.
process.step1Desc: We analyze your workflow and identify where AI software can deliver the most value. We evaluate which AI models (OpenAI v5.2, Claude, AWS Bedrock) and frameworks (LlamaIndex, MCP Servers) best fit your use case, then define success metrics and technical requirements.
process.step2Desc: We design the AI software architecture, selecting the optimal combination of OpenAI v5.2 (GPT-4), Claude Opus/Sonnet, AWS Bedrock, LlamaIndex, and MCP Servers. We design integration points, API connections, and create comprehensive test cases for each AI model interaction.
process.step3Desc: We build the AI software, configure OpenAI v5.2, Claude, and AWS Bedrock models, implement LlamaIndex RAG pipelines, set up MCP Server connections, and train on your data. Comprehensive testing across all AI models and integrations ensures reliability.
process.step4Desc: We deploy your AI software to production, integrating with your existing systems via MCP Servers and APIs. Full documentation, team training, and handover ensure your team is fully equipped to work with the AI software.
process.step5Desc: Post-deployment, we monitor AI software performance, analyze usage patterns, and continuously improve the AI models. Regular updates keep your AI software ahead of the curve with the latest capabilities from OpenAI, Anthropic, and AWS.

businessGrowth.title: How AI Software Drives Business Growth
businessGrowth.subtitle: See how our AI software solutions deliver measurable improvements in revenue, efficiency, and operational costs. Real results from real implementations.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.metaTitle: About Us | AX86 - Meet Our Engineering Team
aboutPage.metaDesc: Meet the AX86 team - 20 expert engineers building enterprise AI solutions. Led by CEO Carlos Montiel, a hands-on technical leader who codes alongside the team.
aboutPage.heroSubtitle: A team of 20 passionate engineers, led by a CEO who still writes code every day. We don't just sell AI solutions‚Äîwe build them from the ground up.
aboutPage.ceoBio1: , our founder and CEO, isn't your typical executive. While many tech CEOs step away from the code, Carlos remains an active member of our development team.
aboutPage.ceoBio2: Every day, he writes code alongside our engineers, reviews pull requests, and stays hands-on with every project. This isn't just leadership‚Äîit's commitment to craftsmanship.
aboutPage.ceoQuote: You can't build great AI solutions from a boardroom. You build them in the trenches, debugging at 2 AM, optimizing prompts until they're perfect.
aboutPage.ceoQuote2: The best AI solutions come from teams where leadership understands the technology deeply. I code every day because that's how I ensure we deliver excellence.
aboutPage.teamSubtitle: Our team combines deep expertise in AI/ML, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise software to deliver solutions that transform businesses.
aboutPage.team1Desc: 8 specialists in machine learning, natural language processing, and AI model optimization. Expert in OpenAI, Claude, and custom model development.
aboutPage.team2Desc: 6 cloud architects specializing in AWS, scalable infrastructure, and enterprise-grade deployments. Certified in AWS Bedrock and cloud security.
aboutPage.team3Desc: 4 engineers focused on MCP server development, API integrations, and connecting AI systems with enterprise databases and workflows.
aboutPage.team4Desc: Full-stack capabilities across the team, building beautiful interfaces and robust backends that seamlessly integrate with AI systems.
aboutPage.team5Desc: Dedicated security practices ensuring all AI solutions meet enterprise standards for data protection, compliance, and privacy.
aboutPage.team6Desc: Expert data pipeline development, ETL processes, and analytics systems that power intelligent AI decision-making.
aboutPage.value1Desc: We measure success by business outcomes, not buzzwords. Every AI solution we build is designed to deliver measurable ROI and real competitive advantage.
aboutPage.value2Desc: We don't take shortcuts. Our code is clean, documented, and built to last. When our CEO reviews your pull request, he expects the same standards he holds himself to.
aboutPage.value3Desc: We're not vendors‚Äîwe're partners. Your success is our success. We work alongside your team, transfer knowledge, and build solutions you can own.
aboutPage.value4Desc: AI evolves daily. So do we. Our team constantly experiments with the latest models, frameworks, and techniques to bring you cutting-edge solutions.
aboutPage.why1Desc: A CEO who codes means decisions come from deep technical understanding, not sales decks.
aboutPage.why2Desc: 50+ AI projects delivered. We've solved complex problems across industries.
aboutPage.why3Desc: 20 engineers covering every aspect‚Äîfrom AI models to cloud deployment to security.
aboutPage.why4Desc: SOC 2 compliance, GDPR readiness, and enterprise-grade security built into everything we do.
aboutPage.readySubtitle: Let's discuss how our team can help transform your business with AI.
aboutPage.ctaSubtitle: Join the companies that trust AX86 to transform their operations with AI. Book a free consultation and meet the team that will make it happen.
aboutPage.globalSubtitle: AX86 was founded in Guatemala and has grown to serve clients across the Americas. With operations in Guatemala and Canada, we bring Latin American innovation and North American enterprise standards together.
aboutPage.guatemalaDesc: Where it all began. Our engineering team is headquartered in Guatemala City, bringing world-class AI development from the heart of Central America.
aboutPage.canadaDesc: Expanding our reach to serve enterprise clients across North America with local presence and support in the Canadian market.

processPage.title: Our Process
processPage.subtitle: A proven 8-12 week journey from discovery to deployment
processPage.step1Desc: We analyze your business workflows, identify automation opportunities, and define success metrics. Our team evaluates which AI models (OpenAI, Claude, AWS Bedrock) and frameworks best fit your use case.
processPage.step2Desc: We design the AI agent architecture, select the optimal model combination, and plan integration points. Comprehensive test cases and validation criteria are established.
processPage.step3Desc: Our engineers build the AI solution, configure models, implement RAG pipelines with LlamaIndex, and train the system with your data. Rigorous testing ensures reliability.
processPage.step4Desc: We deploy your AI solution to production, integrate with existing systems via MCP servers and APIs. Full documentation and team training ensure smooth handoff.
processPage.step5Desc: Post-deployment, we monitor performance, analyze usage patterns, and continuously improve the AI models. Regular updates keep your solution cutting-edge.
